Posts.Content: I just went through the mammo and US because of the same burning type pain. I also had a lump that I could feel. Turns out it is jsut some fluid filled cysts and if they start bothering me too much I can have them drained, but at this point I'd rather deal with it.
Posts.Title: sore/burning sensation in left breast

Posts.Content: Anyone have experience with this? I have had the bruise on my left breast around the 2:00 area since July. Finally got the nerve to go to the dr and am having a mammogram and US tomorrow afternoon. From what I have read, I shouldn't worry because it is painful. There is a small lump under the bruised area though which is concerning me. I'll know soon enough what is going on.. just wanted to see if anyone else had experience with it. TIA.
Posts.Title: aching breast and bruise that won't go away

Posts.Content: well, I had the mammogram and US done. I don't know what the mammo. said, but the ultrasound showed a few black spots. From what I have been reading online I am not sure if that is good news, or bad.
Posts.Title: aching breast and bruise that won't go away
